Description: This exciting role will involve the following:· Support and administration of business-critical IT infrastructure, systems, and applications· Remote and on-site technical support for high stakes exams and assessment projects· Collaboration with internal DevOps and business users to scope infrastructure requirements· Architecture design and implementation of highly available applications· Continuous improvement of technical solutions and processesTo be successful, you must have:· Strong Windows and Linux systems admin experience· Experience with virtualization technologies such as VMware ESX and Hyper-V· Solid understanding of IT best practices for performance, availability, scalability, and security· Solid understanding of networking and core internet protocols· A passion for technology and learningJob Details
